document_data.name: Baerann Kordeemur
document_data.basicrefs: {{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20211028234155/http://candlekeep.com/downloads/So_Saith_Ed_Part25_%282010-2016%29.zip| title = So Saith Ed 2010-2016| accessdate = 25-11-2021| date = 25-11-2021}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Baerann Kordeemur''' was a famous composer of [[Mulhessen]], considered to be the most prestigious tunesmith of [[Sembia]] by some in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Baerann was a handsome, womanizing man with a white beard.
document_data.History: Baerann created many "court dances," popular among the nobles and the upper-crust societies throughout the [[Heartlands]] of [[Faer√ªn]]. His compositions were complex pieces of swelling music that regularly stopped for a mere beat before continuing on in a swirl of fantastic and bombastic melodies, only to stop and continue over and over again.
